title: 40 for 40, Part Three: The BIG BOWLS, and also Wisconsin discovers Vegas buffets
description:
In part three of this year's 40 for 40 preview spectacular, Holly, Jason, and Spencer cover 

Why tertiary character Pat Narduzzi can't carry a full storyline by himself for Pitt

Wisconsin getting the classic "garden hose of Jack" at a Vegas buffet 

Utah playing every snap with eleven fullbacks on every play 

The exhausting personal life of Tony the Tiger at the Sun Bowl 

A generic preview of your bowl game if it gets canceled after we publish this podcast
